title: Katharine McPhee and David Foster share photos of Maldives honeymoon
text:
They've been married for less than four months.

But Katharine McPhee and David Foster seemed to be having the time of their lives as they soaked up the sun during on a romantic honeymoon in the Maldives.

The 35-year old actress took to Instagram to share a series of bikini shots where she joked about her new husband's photography skills.

Vacation: Katharine McPhee and David Foster seem to be having the time of their lives as they soaked up the sun during on a romantic honeymoon to the Maldives

Katharine revealed that she got David 'out of his comfort zone' with a ride on swings and snorkeling while on the tropical island.

'Tried to get him to join me climbing a coconut tree to no avail,' she wrote across one bikini image. 'So I just made him take pics.'

The Waitress star looked completely at ease as she tanned on the beach, with David snapping awkward angles of his beaming bride.

Professional: The 35-year old actress took to Instagram to share a series of bikini shots where she joked about her new husband's photography skills

Model behavior: The Waitress star looked completely at ease as she tanned on the beach, with David snapping awkward angles of his beaming bride

'Most the pics he took were really great,' she joked to her 672,000 fans on social media. 'Another very flattering paparazzi like photo.'

After tanning, Katharine covered up in a grey dress to bike around the island located in the Arabian Sea.

She tied back her shoulder-length brown hair into a loose ponytail and kicked up her feet while riding a beach cruiser.

'Most the pics he took were really great,' she joked to her 672,000 fans on social media

Athletic: After tanning, Katharine covered up in a grey dress to bike around the island located in the Arabian Sea

Good times: She tied back her shoulder-length brown hair into a loose ponytail and kicked up her feet while riding a beach cruiser

The happy couple were all smiles to catch a sunset while enjoying a romantic dinner on their last night in paradise.

David, 69, and Katharine said 'I do' in front of nearly 100 guests at their London wedding, including David's two daughters, Sarah and Erin, who he shares with ex-wife Rebecca Dyer.

Katharine was previously married to Nick Cokas between 2008 and 2016. Interestingly, David played the piano at their wedding.

David has been married four times and has five daughters and seven grandchildren. His last marriage to Yolanda Hadid came to an end in 2017.

Majestic: The happy couple were all smiles to catch a sunset while enjoying a romantic dinner on their last night in paradise
description: The 35-year old actress took to Instagram to share a series of bikini shots where she joked about her new husband's photography skills.
